Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Racine
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
